resources.string: \t\tI\'ve learned native android development in 1st week, May, 2022.Firstly,I learned kotlin programming language.Later,I\'ve started learning android development and still enjoying it a lot.\n\t\tI apply this project for my junior android developer job position and hope you enjoy it.

\t\tThis project shows detailed information of movies and tv series.And you can easily search them and can add to your favourite collections.\n\t\tIt uses following features and concepts of android development.

1 - MVVM
		2 - Retrofit
		3 - Room
		4 - Dagger Hilt
		5 - ViewModel , LiveData and Coroutines
		6 - Navigation Components and Safe Args Plugin
		7 - Many UI Components
